pages.title: Aardvark
pages.text: The aardvark ($(o) ARD-vark; Orycteropus afer$()) is a medium-sized, burrowing, nocturnal mammal native to Africa.$(br2)It is the only living species of the order Tubulidentata, although other prehistoric species and genera of Tubulidentata are known.

pages.title: Aardvark
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)3 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:aardvark_cucumber$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
